mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_M(WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, NOTICE_STTS_CD, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, OPERATOR) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{noticeSttsCd}, NOW(), NOW(), #{operator})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE_M WHERE NOTICE_STTS_CD = 'A' ORDER BY NOTICE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_M SET NOTICE_STTS_CD = 'D' , UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
